channel.title: Security on Jagar
channel.description: Recent content in Security on Jagar

item.title: How to create a Firebase login usb
item.description: We will handle the Firebase admin SDK private key in a USB drive then login with it, once the USB is connected using the admin SDK for Java documentations.

item.title: How to open an app using a dialer call in Android Studio
item.description: We will explain in few easy steps how to keep your app’s icon hidden in the main menu, and how to open it only by dialing a specific code in the default android dialer. You can also let the user specify his own dialer number to open your app.
